contentTypes.name: Featured Posts Section
contentTypes.description: This is a collection of posts you want to showcase in higher priority.

contentTypes.name: More Posts Section
contentTypes.description: This section will show a certain amount of posts and filter out any that are shown in the featured post section, if included.

settings.helpText: If you need to attach tracking parameters to a Target page URL, you can add them here separated by "&".
Leave empty for a default (White) color palette
When the field is left empty, the page will render with default SEO tags
This will override the page title in search engine results
This will be displayed in search engine results
This represents the page in the url of the site like: www.example.com/slug
This helps the website rank in search results
An image to represent the post
A single category to explain what the post is about
A list of tags to help with categorization
This is the link to direct to a collection of posts, currently this sits at the "/blog/posts" route
This is the display text for the posts collection link
This will determine whether or not to include the most recent posts or skip to posts not included in featured section

roles.name: Editor
